game.name: 一ノ一
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Decades after human extinction, robots have abandoned the human form. In a world of monochromatic pixel art, this is a 2D adventure of robots resisting regression.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Decades after human extinction, robots have abandoned the human form. In a world of monochromatic pixel art, this is a 2D adventure of robots resisting regression.
